BindingObjectCustomExt.name: BindingObjectCustomExt
BindingObjectCustomExt.description: Represents the external or custom target object that's bound to the entitlements granted with the sellable product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The name of the binding custom object record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the product usage grant.
